content.text:
[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519)

I'm using 13.2.0, but it *should* be backward-compatible. Is there a public host:port:key that you can share so I can try with 13.0.3?

---

[@alanz](@ZcjYF92reFjUtEYdoJ8ulOI6N6klwAAaIkghEEHdvSE=.ed25519) 

Interesting, I've also been using `/public` to test whether messages are coming in. Have you been doing the scrolling trick? I don't remember where I learned it, but sometimes you'll need to scroll up and down in Patchbay to get new posts to show up in the feed. I think it's meant to keep posts from jumping around while you're reading, but it might benefit from a "new posts above, scroll up!" message as well.
